title: How to Make a Baby in Minecraft (Any Version with Mods)

steps.title: Download the mod
steps.content: Download the mod "Minecraft Comes Alive" (comes in any version).

steps.title: Build a house.
steps.content: Build a house. Make it protected, so if you have redstone, put some traps and make a secret door to go inside your house.

steps.title: Find a spouse (this depends on your character's gender).
steps.content: Find a spouse (this depends on your character's gender). Find the one you really love from all that town.

steps.title: Try to let them fall in love with your server.
steps.content: Try to let them fall in love with your server. Get a cool skin pack then click on whoever you like, then click "shake hands". Remember that server name, then click again then click "tell story". Click gift, then kiss. After that, let him or her follow you by clicking again.

steps.title: Walk to your house, but not too quickly.
steps.content: Walk to your house, but not too quickly. Show them the room you made for them.

steps.title: Keep on living with your spouse until you have a baby.
steps.content: Keep on living with your spouse until you have a baby.

steps.title: Keep having dates; maybe one on Stampy's world because it's really nice there.
steps.content: Keep having dates; maybe one on Stampy's world because it's really nice there. Do some chatting and keep looking forward to a baby. Prepare a room for that baby. Don't make it too babyish; they grow up fast. If you're a male, then give a flower to your wife. If you're a female, get the unforgettable date with your husband.

steps.title: Name the baby anything you like.
steps.content: Name the baby anything you like. Boys are blue, girls are pink. If you're a male, your wife will give the baby to you. If you're a female, give the baby to your husband.

steps.title: Let the baby grow up to at least 5.
steps.content: Let the baby grow up to at least 5. Go traveling for the spouse you love most. If you love that one, stay there. If you leave them, they can get mad at you and exact revenge.
